"A.P.242/3/10/12:15": "No sooner had you vanished into thin air than you appear here in this remote location... One that holds something of great importance."
"It would not happen to be that large stone in the back, would it?"
"Putting up quite the fight, aren't we... However, it is not enough."
"Such a trifling matter. Now for you."
"...Do you not see? Your actions have angered the land."
"Magatsu is a wicked god. But it is a god nonetheless. And where else would a god unleash its indignance, than upon the ones who blaspheme it."
"Quest progress up to this point has been saved."
